entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Parry Sound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:59 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Parry Sound Harbour 09:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
Temperature: 0.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 73 %
Dewpoint: -3.8°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this morning then light this afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Rain beginning in the morning. Risk of freezing rain late in the morning and early afternoon. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the morning. High plus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
